attributes.action: Ensure the availability of live coverage of the Paralympics by making it one of the listed events in sport.
attributes.additional_details: The Ofcom Code on Sports and Other Listed & Designated Events is a series of regulations designed to protect the availability of live coverage of listed events in sport on free-to-air terrestrial television in the United Kingdom. The Paralympics is not one of them, I feel this is wrong. If you feel the same way please ensure that everyone can watch these athletes in the future by signing this petition.
